metadata.title: CVE-2017-12626 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Apache POI in versions prior to release 3.17 are vulnerable to Denial of Service Attacks: 1) Infinite Loops while parsing crafted WMF, EMF, MSG and macros (POI bugs 61338 and 61294), and 2) Out of Memory Exceptions while parsing crafted DOC, PPT and XLS (POI bugs 52372 and 61295).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-poi-java - 4.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1-1').
